pullrequest.title: Model submission for X1 sensor configuration 6.

content.raw: For a ground vehicle with the sensor mounted so close to the ground, the difference is fairly negligible.   However, I think that aerial vehicles will benefit from non-LIDAR based sensors.  What range value does a depth camera return from an area?  Is it the minimum, average, or maximum distance from that cell’s area or is it a singular point?
content.html: For a ground vehicle with the sensor mounted so close to the ground, the difference is fairly negligible. However, I think that aerial vehicles will benefit from non-LIDAR based sensors. What range value does a depth camera return from an area? Is it the minimum, average, or maximum distance from that cell’s area or is it a singular point?
